Articles.Content: The title sort of says it all, but I'll explain it anyways. I recently discovered this on a mission to Jool, whereas when I turn off my SAS, torque not disabled on the module, it starts a roll that is uncontrollable. I've tried everything, but nothing happens. I can temporarily cease the roll by disabling every SAS, even the capsule-built ones. Any tips?
Have you tried clearing the trim with Alt+X?
